review: For the price, it is a pretty cool device.  Not as good as my Apple TV, but not the same price point.  Would be nice to have it's own controller for the most popular items.  It's clearly stated that it doesn't, so I can't complain.  I'm able to sync my Apple TV controller to my universal remote, so it makes for not having to use multiple remotes (sure the same can be said of any streaming device with controller).  Even my 5 year old can use.  This one is a bit more complex, with using the remote and device, but 8 year old can easily do.  I do like the idea of queuing up multiple Youtube episodes, which keeps my 5 year old happy and not tying up both the TV and iPad.
author: Porktown
